name: ScribaSDK
summary: An iOS SDK to enable apps to access all the functionality of the Scriba stylus, a radical new stylus design for mobile devices
description:
To allow third-party developers to integrate the unique features of the Scriba stylus
into their applications, we developed the Scriba SDK. There a number of features of
the SDK that would be expected of a stylus, such as pressure sensitivity and Bluetooth
Low Energy pairing, etc.. But what makes Scriba different are the additional features
unique to Scriba that can enhance apps beyond what one might expect to use a 'pen'.
Whether controlling a presentation; triggering your phone's camera or creating beautiful
art - Scriba has the flexibility to do so much more!
